version_description:
Thanks for using the MyVTech Baby 1080p app!

We are always making improvements to our app to make it better for you. This update includes: 
-Camera settings menu optimized 
-Minor text layout changes
-General bug fixes and stability improvements

We constantly improve our app for better user experience. This software update includes: 

- Add support for motion triggered video recording
- Improvement to LAN search for RMxxx2 series models      
- Various bug fixes and stability improvements

We constantly improve our app for better user experience. This software update includes: 

- Add support for motion triggered video recording
- Improvement to LAN search for RMxxx2 series models      
- Various bug fixes and stability improvements

We constantly improve our app for better user experience. This software update includes: 

- Add support for motion triggered video recording
- Improvement to LAN search for RMxxx2 series models      
- Various bug fixes and stability improvements

1) Fix the popping noise reported by some users when accessing the talk-back feature
2) Improved the slow response time of the night light status as reported by some users
3) Improved the slow response time of feature setting changes made at the app as reported by some users
4) Adds a new selectable "Wallpaper" feature to the main menu
5) Includes the provision for a new "Cry detection" feature for RM57x4, RM58x4, RM77x4 series - (requires camera firmware v1.0.3.3 - coming soon)
6) Updates the date format displayed on alerts
7) Various bug fixes and improvements

1) Fix the popping noise reported by some users when accessing the talk-back feature
2) Improved the slow response time of the night light status as reported by some users
3) Improved the slow response time of feature setting changes made at the app as reported by some users
4) Adds a new selectable "Wallpaper" feature to the main menu
5) Includes the provision for a new "Cry detection" feature for RM57x4, RM58x4, RM77x4 series - (requires camera firmware v1.0.3.3 - coming soon)
6) Updates the date format displayed on alerts
7) Various bug fixes and improvements

Fixes bug that prevented camera previews from loading when using cellular data
Fixes the camera LED indication setting in menu

Fixes bug that prevented camera previews from loading when using cellular data
Fixes the camera LED indication setting in menu
-General bug fixes and stability improvements

- UI update to improve the add camera process
- Fixed bug that prevented the HD selection in live view for VM901 model
- Improved synchronisation of push notifications between app and server
- Various bug fixes and improvements

iOS 14 compatibility update
German language support
